phasing_details.phase_detail: Installation of front elevation shop front glazing.

decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - Commencement of development (Full Permission) - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - Approved Plans - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: Site location plan and drawings 10250,10291 and 11000

Condition : 3 - Materials to be Approved - Prior to first occupation, details of particulars of the materials and design of the security shutter to be used on the development hereby permitted, (notwithstanding any materials specified in the application form and/or the approved drawings) shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval. No works which are the subject of this condition shall be carried out until the details are approved, and the development shall be carried out in full accordance with the approved details unless agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 4 - Shop Display - Before the use hereby permitted commences, a front window display shall be provided and permanently maintained to the satisfaction of the local planning authority.

Condition : 5 - No refuse or waste material of any description shall be left or stored anywhere on the site other than within a building or refuse enclosure. 
REASON: To safeguard the appearance of the property and the amenities of the area.

Condition : 6 - INFORMATIVE
In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The application was acceptable as submitted and no further assistance was required.
   ii) The application was approved without delay.

Condition : 7 - INFORMATIVE
The applicant is informed that a separate consent for the disaply for advertisement will be reuqired prior to the installation of any signage on the premises.

Condition : 8 - INFORMATIVE
You are advised to contact the Council's Highways team on 020 8545 3700 before undertaking any works within the Public Highway to obtain the necessary approvals and/or licences. Please be advised that there is a further charge for this work. If your application falls within a Controlled Parking Zone this has further costs involved and can delay the application by 6 to 12 months.
description: REMOVAL OF TWO SEPARATE GLAZED SHOP FRONTS AND SECURITY SHUTTERS. INSTALLATION OF A NEW CONTINUOUS GLAZED ALUMINUM SHOP FRONT SPANNING THE WHOLE OF THE UNIT, WITH PERFORATED SECURITY SHUTTER DOOR OVER,  REINSTATING THE UNIT BACK TO A SINGLE COMMERCIAL PREMISES FOR USE WITHIN USE CLASS E. REMOVAL OF ALL EXTERNAL SIGNAGE AND OTHER GENERAL WORKS OF REPAIR AND REFURBISHMENT.
